title: Patch 6.5 is live!

embed.description: Greetings, summoners. Welcome to patch 6.5, the one where we check in with some old friends that haven't stopped by patch notes for a while and Soraka gets some spicy healing changes. After writing that sentence we're not really sure what 'spicy healing' is, but it probably tastes delicious.

body:
6.5 is Live! - Let us know here if you find any weird bugs so we can check it out!

**Clubs** will be released in the days following the initial 6.5 patch, as we activate it across all regions.

See you on the Rift!
-Mindstar

replies.body:
Hey Thane - I've just updated the OP to clarify.  Clubs will be coming out a few days after the 6.5 patch itself.

Cheers
Mindstar

>Bugfixes (also shipping with 6.5)
>I LIKE TO WATCH "Fixed an issue where games in new champ select queues wouldn't appear in the spectator client card"

Hasn't happened yet. Still cannot see the challenger ranked games in this window.

Um Riot? Is this supposed to happen?

http://s17.postimg.org/yx5pi7rkv/Capture.jpg
They changed (halved) the required XP for each level, so the next time you earn XP you will go to the next level and probably be over half way to the one following.

I agree that going from level 0-30 was a monumental task and required 350+ games in order to do so. But will Riot be adding in anything different to help teach new people better?

I mean, I've played with some level 29-30 people who still don't know what jungling is. Kinda just going to increase the amount of Bronze players and Smurfs there are with just a pure decrease in leveling time.

when the main {{champion:6}}  gets a small nerf, but a decent buff.
http://memesvault.com/wp-content/uploads/Feels-Good-Man-Frog-06.png

hey Mindstar, there is a problem - i update the patch justnow, but there is some problem with my internet when is updating. when it finished, i try to login in with my account but it says rejected patch 6.4. what should i do?

> Please force a repatch following these steps;

* Go to your Riot Games folder (Default path: C:/Riot Games/League of Legends)
* Open the following directory:
 * C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\{highest version number}
* Delete the following files:
 - releasemanifest 
 - S_OK
* Open the Deploy folder
* Delete the following folders/files:
 - lib (folder) 
 - META-INF (folder) 
 - mod (folder) 
 - lolclient.exe (file) 
 - lolclient.swf (file) 
 - locale.properties (file)
* Restart League of Legends

> IF THAT DID NOT WORK, PLEASE TRY THE FOLLOWING:

* Delete the following folder:
 * <C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_launcher
* Restart League of Legends
No guiunsoo's nerf? :c the mixed dmage coming of it makes it so much harder to deal with, even when playing full tank.{{item:3070}}
This patch is awesome and I love the Urgot love as well xD{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
So hyped for the Clubs thing. Pls rito turn this on asap
